page.title: 01DOMESDAY PROJECT EXTENDED
page.content: Geography,History and Computer Studies lessons received a new life as the school scoured the survey area for information. Among the people interviewed were Miss Wilk,{Principal Nursing Officer}, Swandean Hospital,Mr.Dennis Stepney,owner of Goar Cottage,the former Worthing Poor House,and Mrs.Wilkins,of Findon Valley,who photographed the area in 1930,and 1977. Teacher,John Leitch,said,"The most important thing is that children learn to use their eyes,and recognise what is around them.The children are gaining experience in mapping,recording and interviewing,as well as just plain enjoyment."
